titles.title: MP427 Lord, Come And Heal Your Church

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, come and heal Your church,
Take our lives and cleanse with Your fire.
Let Your deliverance flow,
As we lift Your name up higher.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of God, come in
And release our hearts to praise You.
Make us whole, for
Holy we'll become, and serve You.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Show us Your power, we pray,
That we might share in Your glory.
We shall arise and go
To proclaim Your works most holy.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We will draw near,
And surrender our fear;
Lift our hands to proclaim
Holy Father, You are here.
